001package org.dragonitemc.minigames.bridge;
002
003import com.ericlam.mc.minigames.core.SectionTask;
004import com.ericlam.mc.minigames.core.manager.PlayerManager;
005
006/**
007 * SectionTask 的部分預設版本
008 */
009public abstract class AbstractSectionTask implements SectionTask {
010
011    protected PlayerManager playerManager;
012    protected boolean running = false;
013
014    @Override
015    public boolean isRunning() {
016        return running;
017    }
018
019    @Override
020    public void initTimer(PlayerManager playerManager) {
021        this.playerManager = playerManager;
022        initRun(playerManager);
023    }
024
025    public abstract void initRun(PlayerManager playerManager);
026
027    @Override
028    public void setRunning(boolean b) {
029        this.running = b;
030    }
031}
